definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to, characteristic of, associated with, or suggestive of William Shakespeare (an English playwright ), his works, or his authorship, or the time in which he lived.
Derivative of Shakespeare's works or authorship.

main_definition: ( literature ) Of or pertaining to, characteristic of, associated with, or suggestive of William Shakespeare (an English playwright ), his works, or his authorship, or the time in which he lived.
secondary_definitions: Derivative of Shakespeare's works or authorship.
